sentence.Network_en: If you were a manager, would you decentralize authority?
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你是一位管理者, 你愿意实行分权 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: If we decentralize, the provinces will have more autonomy.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们把权力下放, 各省就有更多的自主权.

sentence.Network_en: And as businesses decentralize and downsize, information systems follow suit.
sentence.Network_cn: 并且随着企业的分散化和小规模化, 信息系统也产生同样的变化.

entry.tran: 使（政府或大型机构）权力分散;下放…的权力
entry.def: To decentralize government or a large organization means to move some departments away from the main administrative area, or to give more power to local departments.

example.ex: They have decentralised the company and made it less bureaucratic.
example.tran: 他们已经分解了该公司的权力，以抑制其官僚作风。

example.ex: ...the need to decentralize and devolve power to regional governments...
example.tran: 将权力下放并移交给地方政府的需要

sentences.sentence: "After the revolution, food distribution was decentralized"

means.word_mean: 权力下放;将(权力等)自中央政府转到地方政府

sentences.en: to decentralize and geographically disperse political and economic power
sentences.cn: 将政治和经济权力下放和分散到各地区

means.word_mean: 将(工业、工人等)自集中点分散到较大的区域内

sentences.en: We decentralized our operations last year and opened several regional offices.
sentences.cn: 去年我们分散了业务,开设了几个地方办事处。
